CheckpointArchiveTypesIfNeeded.hpp File Reference

#include <boost/version.hpp>
Include dependency graph for CheckpointArchiveTypesIfNeeded.hpp:

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Include CheckpointArchiveTypes.hpp only on Boost >= 1.40.

Intended for use by source files that would otherwise trigger compilation failures on Boost >= 1.40 due to header include order problems.
